scripts.dev-cnc-grbl: cross-env TARGET_ENV=CNC SUBTARGET_ENV=GRBL concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-cnc-fluidnc: cross-env TARGET_ENV=CNC SUBTARGET_ENV=FluidNC concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-printer-marlin: cross-env TARGET_ENV=Printer3D SUBTARGET_ENV=Marlin concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-printer-repetier: cross-env TARGET_ENV=Printer3D SUBTARGET_ENV=Repetier concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-printer-smoothieware: cross-env TARGET_ENV=Printer3D SUBTARGET_ENV=Smoothieware concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-printer-marlin-embedded: cross-env TARGET_ENV=Printer3D SUBTARGET_ENV=Marlin-embedded concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-printer-reprap-embedded: cross-env TARGET_ENV=Printer3D SUBTARGET_ENV=RepRap-embedded concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-printer-reprap: cross-env TARGET_ENV=Printer3D SUBTARGET_ENV=RepRap concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-sand-grbl: cross-env TARGET_ENV=SandTable SUBTARGET_ENV=GRBL concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.dev-sand-fluidnc: cross-env TARGET_ENV=SandTable SUBTARGET_ENV=FluidNC concurrently "npm run server" "npm run front"
scripts.buildprinter: npm run printer-marlin && npm run printer-repetier && npm run printer-smoothieware && npm run printer-reprap && npm run printer-reprap-embedded && npm run printer-marlin-embedded
scripts.buildcnc: npm run cnc-grbl && npm run cnc-fluidnc
scripts.buildsand: npm run sand-grbl && npm run sand-fluidnc
scripts.buildall: npm run buildsand && npm run buildprinter  && npm run buildcnc
